content.question: Which of the following is a convergent <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-series?

choices.label: <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of n cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, open parenthesis, one third, close parenthesis, to the n power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator the square root of n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator the square root of n, close parenthesis, cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator the square root of n, close parenthesis, cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test to apply.
